DESCRIPTION: Consume X points of #yFlowingShape to trigger the card's additional effect
For each layer, gain 1 point of #yFlowingShape at the end of each turn.
For each layer, randomly gain 1 point of #yAny_Form_of_FlowingShape, #yEcology, or #yFlowingShapeGrowth at the end of each turn.
Consume X points of #yFlowingShape:Defender to trigger the card's additional effect
Consume X points of #yFlowingShape:Guard to trigger the card's additional effect
For each layer, deal 6 points of damage to all enemies at the start of each turn.
For each layer, gain 7 points of Block at the start of each turn.
Generally, you need X points of #yEcology to use it. #yEcology will not be consumed by cards
For each layer, your next attack card gains [E] [E] and draws 1 card.
